name: magnet-pull
short_effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using its magnetic force.
